full_output.summary: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented Data Analyst with a strong foundation in statistical analysis, data visualization, and database management. Proficient in SQL, Python, and Power BI, with hands-on experience in analyzing complex datasets to uncover actionable insights. Seeking to leverage analytical skills and technical expertise in a dynamic organization to drive business growth and efficiency.

certifications.description: The training consisted of Data, Introduction to Python, Data Exploration and Pre-Processing and Machine Learning algorithms.

projects.name: E-Commerce Sales Analysis
projects.description: Perform SQL queries to analyze sales trends, customer behavior, and product performance. Used Python for data manipulation and visualization (e.g., pandas, matplotlib, seaborn). Some insights extracted like total sales per category, cumulative sales per month for each year, year-over-year growth rate of total sales.

projects.name: Hotel Booking Cancellation Analysis
projects.description: Used Python for Exploratory Data Analysis and visualizations (e.g., pandas, matplotlib, seaborn). Analyzing the graphs, extracted some meaningful like Reservation Cancellation Rates, Average Daily Rates, Price and Cancellation Relationship etc. Implement dynamic pricing strategies to reduce cancellations due to high prices.

projects.name: Data Visualization: Empowering Business with effective insights
projects.description: Cleaned dataset using Power Query editor and created interactive dashboards and visualizations using Power BI. Extracted the information analyzing dashboards - time series of the revenue data, top 10 countries generating the highest revenue, top 10 customers by revenue and regions have high demand for the products.
